page.title: 05TRANSPORT IN NORTH FAREHAM.
page.content: The N.Fareham area is dissected by 2 main roads,the A32 and the A333.The A32 is one of the major routes linking Fareham and London and the north Hampshire towns,consequently it is a very busy road.Large trucks carry imports and exports from the docks at Portsmouth and Southampton and it is used by tourists heading for the continental ferries.Daily,tankers collect the milk from local farms and carry it to Portsmouth.The A333 carries traffic from the Portsmouth area to and from Winchester.It carries mostly commuter traffic and being narrow this road can be dangerous at rush hour.Both routes have an hourly bus service linking Fareham,Portsmouth and Winchester.There are no other major road routes and no rail routes at all in this area.
